title: Taking This Week Off!
description:
We are taking the week off! If you want to get into the holiday mood with some JUSTICE, we have a huge archive of holiday-related episodes for your enjoyment. Take a listen to one of these and have a great week! We'll be back next week with more justice!

  • Episode 8: TO TREE OR NOT TO TREE
  • Episode 88: PROBABLE CLAUS
  • Episode 89: AWAY WITH THE MANGER
  • Episode 139: THE JUDGE JOHN HODGMAN HOLIDAY SPECIAL
  • Episode 189: IT'S BEGINNING TO LOOK A LOT LIKE CHAMBERS
  • Episode 214: THE SANTA SUIT
  • Episode 228: FELIZ GRAVITAS
  • Episode 240: HOCKEY DOCKEY CHRISTMAS
  • Episode 269: OBJECT THE HALLS WITH BOUGHS OF JUSTICE
  • Episode 292: CONIFER EMPTOR
  • Episode 343: LODGING: A COMPLAINT
  • Episode 395: WREATHING HAVOC
  • Episode 397: QUID PRO HO HO HO
  • Episode 435: SNICKERDOODILIGENCE
  • Episode 453: HOLIDAY LEFTOVERS
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
